 2008-14222008-07-30INDUSTRY,  ,  ,  , 
ActBusiness Development Bank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of PRASHANT SHANKER PATHAK of Toronto, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Business Development Bank of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of John Hyshka.
AttachmentsAttachment
